tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE equipment_inventory (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    equipment_type VARCHAR(100),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    allocated_to VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_inventory (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_allocations (
  allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  allocation_date DATE,
  return_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE employee (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(100),
    position VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_allocation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    allocation_date DATE,
    return_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment_inventory(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee(id)
)

CREATE TABLE allocations (
  allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  equipment_id INT,
  allocation_date DATE,
  return_date DATE
);
